capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leading multidisciplinary teams to plan and execute large-scale events.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Ensuring the successful planning, logistics, and execution of over 150 third-party large-scale events.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Developing and implementing detailed event management plans, managing budgets, timelines, and safety protocols.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaborating with government and private stakeholders to elevate tourism and recreation in National Parks.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Negotiating with external contractors and consultants to deliver strategically significant events.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Applying effective planning, coordination, and control methods to manage major public events and complex event projects.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Addressing challenges related to event development, delivery, and risk management.

skills.name: Stakeholder Collaboration
skills.description: Engaging with government and private stakeholders to enhance visitation and community engagement.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.description: Developing strategies for the execution of large-scale events that align with conservation efforts and tourism enhancement.

skills.name: Budget Management
skills.description: Overseeing and managing significant budgets for large-scale events.

skills.name: Risk and WHS Management
skills.description: Implementing safety protocols and managing risks associated with large-scale outdoor events.

generalRole.title: Team Leader, Events Management
generalRole.description: This role involves leading the planning, coordination, and execution of large-scale events within national parks, focusing on enhancing visitation, community engagement, and conservation efforts through strategic event management and stakeholder collaboration.
